title: Mississippi Gambler: A Southern Country Novel
description: When Jo Preston Lane was nineteen, she left home thinking that was the answer to her problem, but now, four years later, she must return and who she has to face is the least of her problems. To protect her family, she must keep all she has discovered five months ago a secret. She has little time to prepare for her great escape before her worst nightmare catches up with her. She canâ€™t afford to trust anyone, as her life truly depends on it. Not the police or the FBI.
author: Diana   Anderson
